Why are some people always cry about Data Install? Why would people want to install data when the damn program isnt even run from UMD.

Guys i have the same problem,after introduction when u go to fight in the first castle my game freezes and my psp goes off...my version is 5.50 Prome 4...PLEASE somebody help..any sugestion on what 2 do???

@ Gyakuto

Some games feature extra goodies

One example would be voiced radio transmissions in Metal Gear Solid: Peace Walker, which require data install

Otherwise, you are correct in saying that it's a waste of memory space and that it wouldn't shorten loading times at all (in case anyone else didn't already know, Data Install is really meant for UMD games, for it shortens loading times and increases battery life)

1Macedonia, do you use Tactics Ogre.rar? And not the patched one? Hopefully we'll hear from Morexion. Meanwhile, you can try different Umd Iso Modes, aswell as second rar-file. Otherwise, i don't have a clue really, cuz i never spoiled my sacred D3 with that prometheus thing. Sometimes it makes games totaly unlaunchable. Though, i can not deny titanic work of Liquidzigong, who developed it.

In this torrent, there are two copies of this game.

Tactics Ogre.rar (Clean version)
Tested on PSP-1001 5.50 Prometheus-3
Crashes right before start of the opening battle. 

Tactics Ogre patched.rar (Patched)
Tested on PSP-1001 5.50 Prometheus-3
Plays right through the first battle. Doesn't seem to have any problems. 

If anyone encounters any problems, try skipping the cutscenes. it got me just a bit further on the clean .iso, but still crashed a few seconds into the battle. i havent encountered any crashing in the patched .iso yet

Big thanks for info, Ninjen, hope it'll be helpful to others. I decided to keep both verisons basicaly because there could be trouble launching patched games on any kind of prometheus. Couple of times i already saw how patched games failed to work on prometheus, that's why i've added clean version too. Also, i'm using exactly the clean version on my 6.20 TN-C with Prometheus Iso Loader v1, and it works like a charm.

"You mean, when Ninja/Kunoichi is on your party? Cuz i've already fought against both and they performed as fast as other classes."
